entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
